Package Manual.services

Class IssueAssignmentService

java.lang.Object
Manual.services.BaseService<IssueAssignment,​Long,​IssueAssigmentRepo>
Manual.services.IssueAssignmentService
public class IssueAssignmentService extends BaseService<IssueAssignment,​Long,​IssueAssigmentRepo>
Class that models from IssueAssignmentDTO using IssueAssignmentMapper to be intermediary between the IssueAssignmentController and the database
Author:
sps169, FedericoTB
